title: Create New Employee Profile
description: A new front desk agent has been hired and needs to be set up in the HR and property management systems.

tasks.description: The HR manager creates a new employee profile in the main HRIS system with their personal details.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new employee record is created.

tasks.description: A user account is created for the new employee in the PMS with the appropriate permissions for a front desk agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: A PMS user account is created with the correct access level.

tasks.description: The employee is added to the scheduling software so they can be assigned shifts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The employee is now available to be scheduled for work.
